topics.body:
"@Joshua":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552f138e6368721f1a340700#post_552f138e6368721f1a340700
I doubt it. Deviantart of all sites would be more formal about stuff like that.

And I think I see one of the problems here.

You seem to expect us to treat you like a friend or a relative, You're a complete stranger as far as most of us are concerned. (People don't like it if a stranger comes up to them and screams at them for not showing enough sympathy for their dead dog or something.)

We are not your friends, And if you keep screaming at us, That's never going to happen.

topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552f1a21636872098c600200#post_552f1a21636872098c600200
... Woah.

In other news, I have two weaknesses. One is my memory and the other is my diligence in long periods.
My memory is terrible to the point that unless it is world-ending important, I could easily forget it. Apparently, forgetting my breakfast is common.
My diligence is another thing. I missed another interview. Why? Because I didn't read my own messages due to the crap that keeps getting in there. I could have gotten into something in case something else doesn't work out. SO, I hate myself for it.
